author: UpIsNotJump
description:
Go to https://buyraycon.com/NOTJUMP to get 20% off the Everyday Earbuds! Thanks to Raycon for sponsoring the video. 

This is it — Fallout 4 is a nightmare, and honestly, it feels like my whole career has led to this moment.

Since Fallout 4 Is A Nightmare has been one of my most requested videos (and yes, I’ve never technically reviewed Fallout 4 until now), I went all out. This video represents over 800 hours of work, not even counting the dozens of hours my editor put in. Plus, I spent more than £5,000 on production — Fallout 4 deserves nothing less for the nightmare it is.

I filmed on location in an immersive theater, hired voice actors, added special effects, and even included a full musical number. There are tons of Fallout references sprinkled throughout, calling back to all my past Fallout reviews — because if Fallout 4 is a nightmare, at least we can laugh at it together. Hopefully, this will be my best video ever.

If you enjoy this kind of Fallout 4 nightmare-fueled produ
title: Fallout 4 Is An Absolute Nightmare - This Is Why
